description:
Mugino Shizuri is one of the seven Level 5 espers, ranking fourth after Misaka Mikoto, she is the leader of ITEM, which is at odds with SCHOOL. She looks down upon lower-level espers and does not mind eliminating people who get in her way or go against her, regardless of whether they are enemies or allies.
Her power can create multiple beams that can sear through objects, or she can defend herself by creating a shield of energy. She can also use silicon cards to split her attacks into multiple blasts.
name: Mugino Shizuri
